actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality

official_title: Recognizing the contributions of environmental systems and the technicians who install and maintain them to our quality of life.

summary.text: Recognizes the contributions that environmental systems (heating, ventilation, air conditioning, and refrigeration systems) have made to our quality of life including through reduced energy usage. Recognizes and thanks the technicians who install and maintain such systems. Supports the goals and ideals of National Indoor Comfort Week as proposed by the Air Conditioning Contractors of America.

titles.title: Recognizing the contributions of environmental systems and the technicians who install and maintain them to our quality of life.
